Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class GameBoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.PageController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.GameBoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameBoardController extends PageController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
GameBoardController displays a concise view of the GameBoard on GUI
